title: Anilist Scrobbler
slogan: Please wait, a popup will appear !
question: The popup didn't appeared ?
response: Retry one time, maybe a bug. If it stills stucks, it can be an issue with Anilist API, please contact @leonekmi on Twitter or Telegram.
